tool_description: Lookup geographical location of an IP address.
name: IP Geo Position Lookup
title: IP Geo Position Lookup

api_list.name: /ip/{ip}
api_list.description: Lookup geographical location by IP address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qtech-ip-geo-position-lookup-v1.p.rapidapi.com/ip/172.217.1.68"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qtech-ip-geo-position-lookup-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qtech-ip-geo-position-lookup-v1.p.rapidapi.com/ip/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qtech-ip-geo-position-lookup-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
